com.samysadi.acs.utility

Class NotificationCodes

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.samysadi.acs.core.notifications.CoreNotificationCodes
      • com.samysadi.acs.utility.NotificationCodes

  • public class NotificationCodes
extends CoreNotificationCodes
    This class contains all predefined notification codes.

    0x8XXXXXXX notification codes are reserved.

    Since:
    1.0

      Description: Thrown when the current job is no more defined as the source job of a operation (you can also listen to CoreNotificationCodes.ENTITY_REMOVED on the current job).

      Object: the Job
